snippet: Investors heeded the words of Janet L. Yellen, the nominee to lead the Federal Reserve, who said it was too soon to end the economic stimulus.
abstract: Dow and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index hit highs for sixth consecutive week of gains, as investors continue to take cues from nominee to lead the Federal Reserve, Janet L Yellen, who told a Senate committee it was too early to end the central bank’s stimulus.
lead_paragraph: Investors heeded the words of Janet L. Yellen, the nominee to lead the Federal Reserve, who said it was too soon to end the economic stimulus.

headline.main: Dow and S.&P. Gain for a Sixth Week
headline.print_headline: Dow and S.&P. Gain For a Sixth Week
